segments.text: How silly of you to jump out of the window !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But that was the first thing that came into my mind when I heard the shout earthquake !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not use staircases ? The terror was not so violent at that time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe the situation is too urgent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think I should have jumped in any case .
segments.speaker: S2
